item.description:
We are offering a new lecture series, called Light Lecture Series!

No Matter where we are in life, there is always more to learn.  While it is easy to find continuing education classes that can help you learn a foreign language or a new hobby, there is little to no support available for those who are interested in moving beyond the realm of learning new skills and into the adventure of learning how to live life to its fullest.  With that in mind, the Center of Light will begin offering a new series of lectures called Light Lecture Series.  These classes are designed to be tools for you life so you can gain the skills necessary to live a happier, more fulfilling and productive life.

Our first lecture on meditation will be this MONDAY September 12, 2011

Meditation: The Basics and Beyond

Learn the basics of meditation – stilling the mind, breathing, relaxation – and then learn how to go into the realms of deeper meditation. This lecture teaches students how to ask questions and receive clear answers in meditation, and how to see aspects of themselves that they have not seen before. All experience levels are welcome.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Light Lecture Series - Meditation: the basics and beyond
